articles.description: Rashtriya Janata Dal (RJD) leader Tejashwi Yadav on Saturday took a dig at NDA's presidential pick Droupadi Murmu, saying that they don't want a statue in the president's house.

articles.description: Delhi news today: Meanwhile, AAP has decided to support opposition presidential candidate Yashwant Sinha. The decision was taken by the AAP's political affairs committee.

articles.title: IndiGo Flight's Precautionary Landing In Karachi, All Passengers Safe
articles.description: An IndiGo aircraft flying from Sharjah to Hyderabad had to be diverted to Pakistan today after the pilot reported a technical defect in the aircraft, the airline said in a release. The plane landed in Karachi and all the passengers are safe.
articles.content:
All the passengers onboard flight 6E-1406 are safe, the airline said. (Representational image)
New Delhi: An IndiGo aircraft flying from Sharjah to Hyderabad diverted to Pakistan today after the pil… [+1270 chars]
